title: Maze: Adaptive Constrained Code Generation System
Phase 1: Foundation
notes: Phase 1 complete: Core type system, constraints, llguidance integration, TypeScript indexer, testing infrastructure. All performance targets exceeded (50μs p99 masks, 89% cache hit rate).

title: Phase 2: Syntactic Constraints
description: Implement CFG/Lark grammar builder, multi-language grammars, JSON Schema synthesis, and complete provider adapters. Target: <100μs masks, <50ms compilation, >70% cache hits.
notes: Phase 1 complete with baseline tests. 58 tests passing (20 constraint, 29 type, 12 TypeScript indexer). Coverage: 61% overall, 94% core types. Real llguidance v1.1.0 integrated. Ready to implement grammar builder and templates.

title: Implement CFG/Lark grammar builder
description: Create grammar builder that can generate Lark grammars from templates. Support language-specific customization and optimization passes.
notes: Grammar builder implemented with fluent API, template system, JSON Schema embedding, validation, and composition. 20 comprehensive tests passing. Supports Lark grammar generation with variable substitution, rule/terminal management, and deduplication.

title: Create TypeScript grammar template
description: Complete Lark grammar for TypeScript including functions, classes, interfaces, types, and common patterns. Test with diverse TypeScript code.
notes: TypeScript grammar templates created: function declarations (with async/export/generics), interfaces, type aliases, and file-level constructs. Covers expressions, statements, type system, and control flow.

title: Create Python grammar template
description: Complete Lark grammar for Python including functions, classes, decorators, type hints, and common patterns.
notes: Python grammar templates created: function definitions (with decorators/async/type hints), class definitions (with inheritance/type params), and module-level constructs. Handles indentation, expressions, and statements.

title: Create Rust grammar template
description: Complete Lark grammar for Rust including traits, impl blocks, lifetime annotations, and macros.
notes: Rust grammar templates created: function definitions (with attributes/visibility/generics/lifetimes/where clauses), struct definitions (unit/tuple/named), and impl blocks. Covers Rust type system, patterns, and expressions.

title: Implement JSON Schema synthesis
description: Build JSON Schema generator from type definitions. Support Pydantic models, TypeScript interfaces, and nested structures.

title: Complete provider adapters
description: Finalize adapters for OpenAI, vLLM, SGLang, and llama.cpp. Test with actual providers and validate performance.

title: Phase 3: Type System
description: Implement type inhabitation solver, bidirectional type inference, and language-specific type systems. Target: <1ms type search, >75% type error reduction, <5 iterations convergence.

title: Implement type inference engine
description: Implement bidirectional type inference with forward/backward passes, unification, and constraint solving. File: src/maze/type_system/inference.py. Tests: 15. Target: <100μs per expression.

title: Implement type inhabitation solver
description: Implement type inhabitation search with memoization, pruning, and path ranking. File: src/maze/type_system/inhabitation.py. Tests: 15. Target: <1ms with caching.

title: Implement TypeScript type system
description: Implement TypeScript-specific type parsing, assignability, widening/narrowing, and generic instantiation. File: src/maze/type_system/languages/typescript.py. Tests: 20.

title: Implement type-to-grammar converter
description: Convert types to Lark grammars with primitive/object/union/function conversions. File: src/maze/type_system/grammar_converter.py. Tests: 20. Target: <5ms generation.

title: Implement hole filling engine
description: Implement hole identification, type inference, grammar generation, and hole filling with retry logic. File: src/maze/type_system/holes.py. Tests: 10. Target: <10ms per hole.

title: Integration and optimization
description: Create TypeSystemOrchestrator, integration tests, performance optimization, and documentation. Tests: 10. Target: >75% type error reduction.

title: Phase 4: Validation & Repair
description: Build multi-level validators (syntax, types, tests, lint), RUNE sandbox integration, repair loop with constraint refinement, and pedantic_raven integration. Target: <3 avg repair attempts, >90% repair success.

title: SyntaxValidator - Fast syntax validation with tree-sitter
Optimization & Documentation - Performance tuning and docs
TypeValidator - Type checking with language services
RepairOrchestrator - Adaptive repair with constraint learning
Integration tests - End-to-end validation and repair testing
Phase 5: Adaptive Learning
description: Implement pattern mining, constraint learning, project-specific adaptation, and full mnemosyne integration. Target: >10% improvement with learning, pattern recall across sessions.

title: Phase 6: Production
description: Optimize performance (speculative decoding), complete multi-provider support, IDE integrations, comprehensive benchmarking (HumanEval, MBPP, SWE-bench), and production documentation.
